about_the_game:
In KILLDOZER SIMULATOR, operate an armored bulldozer in a top-down action-packed struggle to flatten the town and clash with The Powers That Be. Upgrade your vehicle, plan your path of destruction, and become a legendary folk hero.

Destructible Environments: Leave your mark on the world with fully destructible environments.

Intense Top-Down Combat: Experience the thrill of battling against government authorities in high-stakes combat. Utilize strategy and firepower to outsmart your opponents and survive against the odds.

Vehicle Customization and Upgrades: Transform your killdozer into an unstoppable force with a variety of upgrades and customizations. Strengthen your defenses, enhance your weaponry, and adapt your vehicle to overcome new challenges as the game progresses.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of violence and destruction involving vehicles and firearms.

detailed_description:
In KILLDOZER SIMULATOR, operate an armored bulldozer in a top-down action-packed struggle to flatten the town and clash with The Powers That Be. Upgrade your vehicle, plan your path of destruction, and become a legendary folk hero.

Destructible Environments: Leave your mark on the world with fully destructible environments.

Intense Top-Down Combat: Experience the thrill of battling against government authorities in high-stakes combat. Utilize strategy and firepower to outsmart your opponents and survive against the odds.

Vehicle Customization and Upgrades: Transform your killdozer into an unstoppable force with a variety of upgrades and customizations. Strengthen your defenses, enhance your weaponry, and adapt your vehicle to overcome new challenges as the game progresses.
name: KILLDOZER SIMULATOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In KILLDOZER SIMULATOR, operate an armored bulldozer in a top-down action-packed struggle to demolish the town and clash with The Powers That Be. Upgrade your vehicle and weapons, plot your path of destruction, and become a legendary folk hero.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
